schemas.title: Jobnik worker options v1
schemas.description: Worker options for creating a new worker using the jobnik sdk

rawContent.description: Worker options for creating a new worker using the jobnik sdk
rawContent.title: Jobnik worker options v1

concurrency.description: The number of concurrent jobs the worker can process

taskHandlerCircuitBreaker.description: Circuit breaker configuration for the task handler. e.g. to prevent running tasks when the handler fails repeatedly

dequeueTaskCircuitBreaker.description: Circuit breaker configuration for the dequeue task operation. e.g. to prevent dequeuing tasks when the jobnik server is unresponsive

backoffOptions.description: Backoff options for retrying failed operations
Configuration options for the exponential backoff strategy

initialBaseRetryDelayMs.description: The initial delay (in milliseconds) for the first retry

backoffFactor.description: The multiplier for each subsequent retry. (e.g., 2 for 1s, 2s, 4s, 8s...)

maxDelayMs.description: The maximum delay (in milliseconds) to cap the backoff at

disableJitter.description: If true, disables jitter, making delays exact (not recommended in production)

maxJitterFactor.description: The percentage (as a decimal) to randomize the delay. e.g., 0.25 means the delay will be randomized to +/- 25% of its calculated value

rawContent.description: Worker options for creating a new worker using the jobnik sdk
rawContent.title: Jobnik sdk full config v1

connectTimeout.description: The number of milliseconds to wait before a connection attempt times out

headersTimeout.description: The number of milliseconds to wait for the headers to be received

bodyTimeout.description: The number of milliseconds to wait for the body to be received

initialBaseRetryDelayMs.description: The initial delay in milliseconds before the first retry attempt

maxRetries.description: The maximum number of retry attempts

maxJitterFactor.description: The maximum jitter factor to apply to retry delays

schemas.title: Circuit breaker options v1
schemas.description: Options to configure opossum based circuit breaker behavior

rawContent.description: Options to configure opossum based circuit breaker behavior
rawContent.title: Circuit breaker options v1

enabled.description: Enable or disable the circuit breaker

errorThresholdPercentage.description: The error percentage at which to open the circuit and start short-circuiting requests

resetTimeout.description: The time in milliseconds to wait before setting the breaker to half-open state, to allow for retries

rollingCountTimeout.description: The duration of the statistical rolling window, in milliseconds. This is how long the metrics used to determine the health of the circuit breaker are kept.

volumeThreshold.description: The minimum number of requests within the rolling statistical window that must exist before the circuit breaker can open.

limit.description: The maximum payload size of an incoming request

enabled.description: Whether to compress response bodies for all request that traverse through the middleware
